Package ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IQuestionManager
    Not implemented yet.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    A class for storing the user's account information.
    Answer
    This is a model class for answers Answers consists of a body, user, list of replies, rating, date and number of replies Answer can also consist of a Photo, if it is attached
    AnswerListAdapter
    This class is a controller class that displays the various answer list items in proper format It displays all the components associated with an Answer object view answer body, username of author, rating, and date are displayed in the list for each answer using this adapter
    ApplicationState
    A static class used for managing the application's data in its current state.
    AuthorAnswerActivity
    A view class that allows a user to edit text and submit it as an answer to a question.
    AuthorQuestionActivity
    This view allows the user to create a question.
    AuthorReplyActivity
    A view class that allows a user to edit text and submit it as a reply to a question or answer.
    BuildConfig  
    CreateAccountActivity
    An activity that allows the user to create a new account and log into it.
    CustomActivity
    An activity used as a starting point for all activities within the application.
    ESQuestionManager
    not implemented yet-- Saved for Part-4 NEED TO HAVE SEARCH AND RESOURSE URLS need two not ONE TODO Implement same methods for answers or create a new class for answer search TODO check the search URL and resource URL-- probably will need two urls for this to work TODO test this class to make sure elastic search works for question TODO write method that returns a list of all questions, to populate home page
    Hits<T>  
    HomeActivity
    This class handles the Activity of the main page which acts as a hub for displaying questions taken from the server and displaying the button to ask a question.
    LoginActivity
    An activity that allows the user to log in to an account.
    MyAnswersActivity
    This class is a view class that displays the questions which contain user authored answers It contains various menu items options which can be selected from this activity page The user can select to view each of the answers and replies corresponding to each question in the list.
    MyFavouritesActivity
    Displays the list of all questions the user has favourited.
    MyHistoryActivity
    This class handles displaying the populated list of every question that is clicked on by the user in the main list of questions from the server.
    MyQuestionsActivity
    This class is a view class that displays the questions that the user asked in the application It contains various menu items options which can be selected from this activity page The user can select to view each of the answers and replies corresponding to each question in the list
    Question
    This is a model class for questions Question consists of a title, body, username, list of replies, list of answers, date and rating Question can also consist of a Photo, if a photo is attached
    QuestionListAdapter
    A class that is an extension of the basic Array Adapter but allows for more specific formatting inside a list view.
    QuestionPageActivity
    A view class that displays the question and all it's attributes Allows users to see a question that has been created as well as all the answers associated with the question.
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    ReadingListActivity
    This is a view class that displays all of the questions that a user has added to their Reading List (Type: ArrayList) The question list displays all of the components associated with a question (eg: title, body, rating, number of answers etc) The user can chose to select a question to view the answers and replies associated with it
    Reply
    This class is our model for replies replies consists of a body, author, and date implemented.
    ReplyListAdapter
    This class is a controller class that displays the various reply list items in proper format It displays all the components associated with a Reply object view Reply, username of author and date are displayed in the list for each reply using this adapter
    ReplyPageActivity
    A view class that displays the replies corresponding to either an answer or a question It contains various menu items options which can be selected from this activity page The user can see the reply body, date, and author's username The user can also see the information associated with an answer or a question, depending on which parent the replies belong to
    SaveManager
    Class not implemented.
    SearchActivity
    This is a view class that displays the results of a search that the user initiated Will be implemented for Project Part-4
    SearchHit<T>
    Class inherited from CMPUT 301 AndroidElasticSearch lab code With a few changes to fit this project
    SearchResponse<T>
    Class inherited from CMPUT 301 AndroidElasticSearch lab code Need to modify to fit funtime_runtime project TODO
    SimpleSearchCommand
    Class inherited exactly from CMPUT 301 AndroidElasticSearch lab code
    Sort
    Class not implemented for this release Will be implemented for part-4
